test.name: Scenario: Verify default values for adults, children, and rooms

kw.name: Given I click on the guest selection field
Click Element
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I will see the displayed default value as "2" adults · "0" children · "1" room
kw.source_name: I will see the displayed default value as "${adults}" adults · "${children}" children · "${room}" room

test.doc: Ensure the default summary is displayed correctly when no changes are made.

test.name: Scenario: Attempt to enter less than 1 adult

kw.name: And I see that the '-' button is enabled
Element Should Be Enabled
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: And I see the displayed default value as "2"
kw.source_name: I see the displayed default value as "${adults}"

kw.name: When I click the '-' button for adults
Then I see the number of adults decrease by 1
And I see that the '-' button is disabled

test.doc: Verify that the system does not allow the number of adults to drop below 1, and the '-' button is appropriately disabled

test.name: Scenario: Attempt to enter more than 1 adult

kw.name: Given I click the '+' button for adults
Click Element
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I see the number of adults increase by 1
And I see that the '-' button is enabled

test.doc: Verify that the system allows increasing the number of adults and ensures the '-' button is enabled when the value is greater than 1.

test.name: Scenario: Select minimum number of guests without rooms

kw.name: Given I see that the '-' button for rooms is disabled by default
Element Should Be Disabled
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is disabled.

kw.name: When I click the '+' button for rooms
Then I see the number of rooms increase by 1
And I see the '-' button for rooms is enabled

test.doc: Verify the system handles the case where guests are selected without increasing the number of rooms and ensures the default room value is maintained.

test.name: Scenario: Select a random age needed for children

test.doc: This scenario verifies that when the "+" button for children is clicked, the number of children increases by 1 and the "Age needed" field appears.

test.name: Scenario: Search for available accommodation

kw.name: Given I click on search button
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I will see mandatory field warning for destination city
When I select a random destionation city
Then I will be redirected to the stay page

test.doc: This scenario verifies the search functionality for accommodations. It ensures that users receive a mandatory field warning when no destination city is selected and that they are successfully redirected to the results page upon selecting a destination.
